title: He told me so many things that were not true, why would a man weave a web of lies, knowing the truth was easy to discover? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know what the actual circumstances are in this case but this isn’t an especially uncommon occurrence. Some people do this because they are being selfish and lazy and the lies serve to make them look better, or get them through or out of trouble at the moment even if they will be discovered later. They sometimes hope people will give them the benefit of the doubt or want to believe their lie enough they will ignore the truth.
